headline: Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT) Advances OT Security Platform With New Capabilities For Critical Infrastructure
summary: Fortinet (NasdaqGS:FTNT) recently advanced its OT Security Platform, enhancing protection for critical infrastructure against evolving cyber threats. This expansion, coupled with Fortinet's collaboration with Honeywell, aligned with efforts to fortify cybersecurity capabilities, which may have positively influenced the share price, contributing to its 0.24% increase over the past quarter. The company’s recent earnings report showed strong financial performance, with notable revenue and net...
